```{r import csv, include=FALSE}
time_series <- read.csv("time_series_final.csv")
time_series
time_series <- na.omit(time_series)
time_series
```

```{r make a datafram, include=FALSE}
time_series_df <- as.data.frame(time_series)
tow <- as.factor(time_series_df$Tow)
```

```{r load packages, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r take out Ram, include=FALSE}
# Use filter to extract specific locations
ram_time_series <- time_series_df %>%
  filter(Site %in% c("Ram"))
ram_time_series_df <- as.data.frame(ram_time_series)
print(ram_time_series_df)
tow <- as.factor(ram_time_series_df$Tow)
class(ram_time_series_df$Date)
ram_time_series_df$Date <- as.Date(ram_time_series_df$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
date <- ram_time_series_df$Date
date
```


```{r ram biovolume plot, include=FALSE}
# Create the plot
biovolume_plot <- ggplot(data = ram_time_series_df, aes(x = date, y = BioVol, fill = tow)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +  # Use dodge for side-by-side bars
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 14),  # Rotate x-axis labels for readability and adjust size
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 14),  # Adjust y-axis text size
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 16),  # Adjust x-axis title size
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 16),  # Adjust y-axis title size
    plot.title = element_text(size = 22, hjust = 0.5)) + # Adjust title size and center it)) +  # Rotate x-axis labels for readability
  ylab(expression("BioVolume (individuals" ~ mL^{-3} * ")")) + 
  xlab("Date") +  # Rename axis titles
  labs(fill = "Mesh Size (microns)") +  # Add a title
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("200" = "black", 
                                "700" = "grey")) + # Define custom colors
scale_x_date(labels = scales::date_format("%m/%d/%Y"))  # Custom format: MM/DD/YYYY

print(biovolume_plot)  # Show the plot
```

```{r top copepods at ram, include=FALSE}
# Summarize the data by Species and Count
summary_count_ram <- ram_time_series %>%
  group_by(X, Tow) %>%
  summarize(total_count = sum(Count), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  arrange(desc(total_count))  # Sort in descending order

# Print the summarized result
print(summary_count_ram)
```

```{r combine centropages counts, include=FALSE}
# Combine the total counts for centropages_hamatus, centropages_sp, and centropages_typicus in the Species column
summary_count_ram <- ram_time_series %>%
  # Create a new Species category for Centropages species
  mutate(Species_combined = case_when(
    X %in% c("Centropages_hamatus", "Centropages_sp", "Centropages_typicus") ~ "Centropages_group", 
    TRUE ~ as.character(X)  # Keep other species as they are
  )) %>%
  # Group by the new combined Species column and Tow
  group_by(Species_combined, Tow) %>%
  # Summarize total count for each combined species and Tow
  summarize(total_count = sum(Count, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  # Sort by total_count in descending order
  arrange(desc(total_count))

# Print the summarized result
print(summary_count_ram)

```

```{r adding up filtered counts, include=FALSE}
# Summarize the data by Species and Tow, adding up all filtered counts
summary_filtered_count_species_tow <- ram_time_series_df %>%
  mutate(Count_Filtered = as.numeric(Count_Filtered)) %>%  # Ensure Count_Filtered is numeric
  group_by(X, Tow) %>%  # Group by Species and Tow
  summarize(total_filtered_count = sum(Count_Filtered, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop') %>%  # Sum the filtered counts
  arrange(X, Tow)  # Optional: Sort by Species and Tow

# Print the summarized result
print(summary_filtered_count_species_tow)
```

```{r adding relative abundance category, include=FALSE}
# Create the relative abundance column
summary_filtered_count_species_tow <- summary_filtered_count_species_tow %>%
  mutate(Count_Filtered = as.numeric(Count_Filtered)) %>%  # Ensure Count_Filtered is numeric
  group_by(X, Tow) %>%  # Group by Species and Tow
  mutate(total_tow_filtered = sum(Count_Filtered, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%  # Calculate total Count_Filtered per Tow
  ungroup() %>%  # Ungroup to prevent issues when applying other functions
  mutate(relative_abundance = Count_Filtered / total_tow_filtered) %>%  # Calculate relative abundance
  arrange(X, Tow)  # Optional: Sort by Species and Tow

# Print the summarized result with relative abundance
print(summary_filtered_count_species_tow)

```
```{r 1 RA for each tow?, include=FALSE}
# Create relative abundance for each species and summarize by Species across Tow categories (200 and 700)
summary_relative_abundance <- ram_time_series %>%
  mutate(Count_Filtered = as.numeric(Count_Filtered)) %>%  # Ensure Count_Filtered is numeric
  group_by(X, Tow) %>%  # Group by Species and Tow
  mutate(total_tow_filtered = sum(Count_Filtered, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%  # Calculate total Count_Filtered per Tow
  ungroup() %>%  # Ungroup to prevent issues with subsequent mutate
  mutate(relative_abundance = Count_Filtered / total_tow_filtered) %>%  # Calculate relative abundance for each row
  # Filter for only tow categories 200 and 700
  filter(Tow %in% c("200", "700")) %>%
  # Summarize relative abundance for each Species across Tow categories (200 and 700)
  group_by(X) %>%
  summarize(relative_abundance_200_700 = sum(relative_abundance, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  arrange(X)  # Optional: Sort by Species for better readability

# Print the summarized result
print(summary_relative_abundance)


```

```{r combine centropages, include=FALSE}
# Combine the relative abundance columns for the three species
summary_filtered_count_combined <- ram_time_series %>%
  mutate(Count_Filtered = as.numeric(Count_Filtered)) %>%  # Ensure Count_Filtered is numeric
  group_by(X, Tow) %>%  # Group by Species and Tow
  mutate(total_tow_filtered = sum(Count_Filtered, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%  # Calculate total Count_Filtered per Tow
  ungroup() %>%  # Ungroup to avoid issues with subsequent mutate
  mutate(relative_abundance = Count_Filtered / total_tow_filtered) %>%  # Calculate relative abundance
  # Create a new column to combine the relative abundance of specific species
  mutate(combined_relative_abundance = case_when(
    X == "centropages_hamatus" ~ relative_abundance,
    X == "centropages_sp" ~ relative_abundance,
    X == "centropages_typicus" ~ relative_abundance,
    TRUE ~ 0  # For other species, assign 0
  )) %>%
  # Sum the combined relative abundance for the three species per Tow
  group_by(Tow) %>%
  mutate(combined_relative_abundance_sum = sum(combined_relative_abundance, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(X, Tow)  # Optional: Sort by Species and Tow

# Print the summarized result with combined relative abundance
print(summary_filtered_count_combined)
```

```{r month and biovol , include=FALSE}
month_biovol <- read.csv("month_biovol.csv")
month_biovol
```

```{r monthly meso ANOVA , include=FALSE}
meso_biovol <- month_biovol %>%
  filter(Tow %in% c("200"))
month <- as.factor(meso_biovol$Month)
biovol_filtered <- as.numeric(meso_biovol$Filtered_BioVol)
meso_aov <- aov(BioVol ~ month, data = meso_biovol)
summary(meso_aov)
TukeyHSD(meso_aov)
```

```{r meso t test , include=FALSE}
t.test(meso_biovol$BioVol)
```

```{r monthly macro ANOVA , include=FALSE}
macro_biovol <- month_biovol %>%
  filter(Tow %in% c("700"))
month <- as.factor(macro_biovol$Month)
biovol_filtered <- as.numeric(macro_biovol$Filtered_BioVol)
macro_aov <- aov(biovol ~ month, data=macro_biovol, var.equal=TRUE)
summary(macro_aov)
TukeyHSD(macro_aov)
```

```{r macro t test , include=FALSE}
t.test(macro_biovol$BioVol)
```

    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 12),  # Adjust x-axis text size
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 14),  # Adjust y-axis text size
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 16),  # Adjust x-axis title size
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 16),   # Adjust y-axis title size
    plot.title = element_text(size = 22, hjust = 0.5)
  ) + 
  ylab(expression("Abundance (individuals" ~ m^{-3}* ")")) + xlab("Date") +  # Rename axis titles
  scale_color_manual(values = c(
    "Acartia_sp" = "#89CFF0", "Calanus_sp" = "#0000FF", "Evadne_nordmanni" = "#191970", "Paracalanus_sp" = "#0096FF", "Obelia_sp" = "#50C878", "Carcinus_maenas" = "#008080", "Podon_polyphemoides" = "#5D3FD3", "Pseudocalanus_sp" = "#4682B4", "Gammarus_sp" = "#454B1B", "Centropages_sp" = "#9FE2BF"
  )) +  # Define colors for each species
  labs()  # Add a title if desired

print(macro_line_graph_filtered)  # Show the plot
